test.name: SecretMMS.TC.016
test.description:
Validate Recipient passwords can be any language including Russian Test Category: MUST Test Steps: --------------------------------------------------------------- Scenario # 1: 1. Login to the MMS Extra Management portal. 2. Verify the list of recipients for a sender who has the Secret feature enabled. 3. Add some passwords in English language to the list of recipients. 4. Verify that the passwords defined are between 6 to 15 characters long. 5. Verify that there are no special characters or spaces in the passwords defined.
Scenario # 2: 1. Login to the MMS Extra Management portal. 2. Verify the list of recipients for a sender who has the Secret feature enabled. 3. Add some passwords in Russian language to the above list of recipients. 4. Verify that the passwords defined are between 6 to 15 characters long. 5. Verify that there are no special characters or spaces in the passwords defined. ---------------------------------------------------------------
